text:
Hey Bro,
I met you for the first time via the Electronics Club and then we prepared for the Engineers Conclave in winter '18. I still remember us struggling to find the display room for the project in IITB :P. You were always so helpful and I remember thinking to myself as to how much you know. Then, we did the TA202A project. I remember us bitching about the team members we ended up with but still getting through the course somehow. ESO203 lab was a nightmare, figuring out which wire went where and invariably us finishing our lab work last before getting to know that the rest of the groups used to cheat :P. The last semester in AML you really helped me bro, I didnt know anything and you literally covered for me so much. I hope I wasn't too much of a burden. I would always cherish your friendship Bro. Always be like this, never change. Hope we stay in contact. 
Wish you a great life ahead.
author: Anirudh  Garg

text:
Hello Roomie, 
Pehle din mile the apan college mei apne room mei. Shayad mera pehla dost college mei. Almost mere akele ka room hi tha looking at jis frequency se tu ghar jaata tha :P Thank You bhai ESC101 samjhane ke liye, bohot help kri thi tune uss course mei. Best of luck and all the best for your life afterwards bro. Hope our paths cross sometime in the future. :)
author: Anirudh  Garg
